item.description: Hey all! It's been a while since we've met, so let's meet at my place to play a new game that I just got, Killer Bunnies and the Quest for the Magic Carrot. The idea is to collect bunnies & carrots, while killing other people's bunnies with weapons like raisins and cheeseballs. It's a lot of fun and very light-hearted; if you're looking for a heavy strategic game like Settlers of Catan, this will not be for you. But if you like laughing and being competitive while keeping a light tone, this is your game! It's also quite condusive to talking and hopefully getting to know each other a bit better as well. I've opened up room for 10; if you'd like to come but not play Killer Bunnies, that's fine too; I've got movies, other games, and we'll have munchies and do something for dinner. So I hope many of you can make it!
item.how_to_find_us: It's my place, so I'll be hard to miss.
item.name: Let's Kill Some Bunnies!
